local_intent: Place white plate onto red plate using pose 'red_plate_place', set TCP yaw, approach, execute PlaceAt, and verify contact.
assumptions: pose 'red_plate_place' has been computed and is available on the blackboard
red_plate remains stationary and accessible during placement
white_plate is held securely in the gripper prior to placement
coherence_with_global: Implements the PlaceAt leaf from GLOBAL_BT: verifies pose availability, orients TCP, approaches red_plate, performs PlaceAt with the prescribed parameters, and verifies contact; aligns with the GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION stepwise plan and success criteria.
